title: Teacher Dashboard Design and Utilization Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic operational experience with online education platforms
context.additional_context: Fostering the ability to design and implement data-driven dashboards for decision-making in language education assessment environments that utilize learners' personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can describe a custom dashboard design framework for visualizing learning activity data in three or more stages.
Learners can design a dashboard prototype that performs educational effectiveness analysis using real classroom data.
Through a co-design process, at least two dashboard improvement proposals reflecting teacher requirements can be presented
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
